topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Beta: Known Issues and Workarounds

b.u: Before running the infra playbooks and bringing up HLM

p.b: Issue 0: The infra playbooks will also create Virtual Machines for Controllers. The UI now does it - so it must be disabled in infra playbooks

section.p: Workaround: Ensure in setup_vcloud.yml, all roles except SETUP-INFRA-ON-AV and HLM-CFG are either removed or commented.

p.b: Issue 1: Left side links "Manage Cloud" and Cloud Status Report dont work - they are under constructions

u.b: Before Running any Deploy Workflow, apply the following workarounds:

p.b: Issue 2: wr.json generated by UI is malformed.

section.p: Cause: Disable the nuage_vrs field last minute before the build - caused this issue

Workaround: Manually correct the wr.json. Generate a temporary cloud definition using rcp topology. Copy its wr.json into your current cloud folder under vars subfolder and hand edit with correct values

p.b: Issue 3: UI will fail your CLM network validation

section.p: Cause: Validation checks if the startip is in-use, and fails if it is. But in CLM case - the startip is always in use cause its used by HLM.
Workaround: Ignore the UI failure and proceed to the next page of the wizard

p.b: Issue 4: Correct node-provision.json is not copied from temporary location to your cloud folder by UI

section.p: Cause: The some paths have changed after deploying the hlm-ui on /var/www... path which the code was not build to handle.
Workaround: After clicking Finish on Cloud Input Wizard, manually copy node-provision.json from /root/hlm-ui/hcginstaller-src/DB_JSON/node-provision.json to the /var/hlm/clouds/<yourcloud>/

p.b: Issue 5: Provisioning took very long on one of our test beds. The controllers were already provisioned and booted.

section.p: Workaround: If the process is not ending, ensure your ssh into each controller using its PXE IP. PXE IP can be found in nodes.json file under cloud folder. If the process is still running kill it. Do ps aux | grep python and see the line that has provision in it and kill that process and proceed with generate step
